text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Hotel" means a hotel or motel with more than 30 rooms for rent that is primarily used by transients who are lodged with or without meals.

"Operating agreement" means a written contract, agreement, instrument, or other document between at least two persons that relates to the management, operation, or franchise of a hotel or a retirement community.
"Person" does not include an individual, a not for profit entity, or a public instrumentality.

section.section: "Retirement community" means a senior living community, retirement community, assisted living community, continuing care retirement community, independent living community, or similar community that offers a combination of independent living, assisted living, or nursing.
